full_summary:
# Janitorial Services – RCMP Fisher Detachment I
## Solicitation Details

* **Solicitation Number:** M5000-21-5215/A
* **Publication Date:** 2023-07-17
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-08-17T16:00:00 (expired)
* **Contracting Entity:** Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP)
* **Contracting Entity Address:** 6101 Dewdney Ave, Regina, SK, S4P 3K7

## Description of Requirement

The RCMP requires all necessary labour, materials, equipment, transportation, and daily site supervision to undertake janitorial services for the RCMP Fisher Detachment, Manitoba, in accordance with the attached Invitation to Tender and Annex A – Janitorial Services. The services are required to be performed 5 days a week during the contract period.

The contract duration is 2 years starting from the contract date, with an optional 3-year extension. The security clearance level required for the contract is stipulated in the attached Invitation to Tender.

A site visit will be conducted for interested bidders. Prior to submitting a tender, bidders should review the Invitation to Tender and attached documents for further information.

## Evaluation Criteria

Tenders will be evaluated on their responsiveness to the bid solicitation and the lowest evaluated price (LEP).

## Procurement Method

This procurement will be undertaken using the Competitive – Open Bidding method.

## Selection Criteria

The bid with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for award.

## Bidder Requirements

To be considered eligible for this procurement, bidders must conform to all requirements outlined in the Invitation to Tender.

## Note

The solicitation is subject to the Integrity Regime administered by Public Services and Procurement Canada. Bidders are required to abide by the integrity provisions specified in the solicitation.

## Opening and Award Procedure

All submissions should be sent to the RCMP Bid Receiving Unit in accordance with the attached Invitation to Tender. 
Files that define the bid solicitation are available for download on GETS at the following link: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities>

This procurement is governed by the Integrity Regime administered by Public Services and Procurement Canada. 

**Note:** This procurement solicitation has expired, and no further submissions will be accepted. 
**End of File**
